Linguistic analysis: The expert may have analyzed the language used in the claim to determine if it aligns with President Donald Trump's typical speech patterns and vocabulary.
Contextual analysis: The expert may have examined the claim in the context of other statements made by President Donald Trump regarding his handling of the COVID-19 pandemic to assess the consistency of the claim.
Fact: checking: The expert may have cross-referenced the claim with reliable sources and fact-checking organizations to verify if President Donald Trump indeed made the statement attributed to him.
Tone and sentiment analysis: The expert may have assessed the tone and sentiment expressed in the claim to determine if it aligns with President Donald Trump's typical communication style and attitude towards criticism and praise.
